aboutMeIntro: I'm a Full-Stack JavaScript Developer based in Paris. Passionate about technology and design, I tend to focus most of my work, research and learning on Front-End. Sensible to UX, I'm a strong believer that products can be unique, creative and authentic as well as providing a great user-friendly experience.

tools: Stack: HTML/SCSS, JS/TS, React, Node, MongoDB | Design: Sketch, Figma.
